page.title: 04Transport
page.content: The fastest train on the{Twyford}line is the Inter_city 125 and the second fastest is the 50 units. They stop at Twyford.They go 100 m.p.h.They run on the Paddington to Bristol or Newbury line.The heaviest locos are the 46 units.They weigh 141 tonnes.The lightest are the London and Bristol units. There is one taxi service in Twyford and a bus service too.There are four bus stops with several buses going to Reading. In the{Woodley Sonning}area private car is main means of transport. There are local buses and long distance buses can be caught at Sonning round_ a_bout to Henley, High Wycombe, London Maidenhead, Marlow.On roads in the area there is a variety of traffic carrying goods to local shops. They are busy only in the morning and even_ ing rush hours.
